meta.description: Charter cruises on the sailing yacht TOAD – Oyster 70. Luxurious 22m yacht with 5 cabins in the Canary Islands. Year-round sailing with ideal climate.

luxurySection.title: Luxury &
luxurySection.subtitle: at the highest level
luxurySection.description: The TOAD is moored year-round in the southwest of Gran Canaria. The Canary Islands offer constant northeast trade winds, mild 26°C air and over 20°C water temperature – ideal from September to May.
features: Oyster 70 with 5 cabins, state-of-the-art technology and complete safety equipment
Weekly cruises, routes according to wind, weather and your wishes
Best climate from autumn to spring, hardly any charter traffic
Multiple daily direct flights, transfer service included

sailArea.label: Sail area
sailArea.value: approx. 260 m² upwind, over 300 m² downwind

sanitary.label: Sanitary
sanitary.value: Each cabin with its own WC / shower

comfort.label: Comfort
comfort.value: Air conditioning, large kitchen, salon with panoramic windows

deck.label: Deck
deck.value: Complete teak deck, protected cockpit, sun loungers

rescue.label: Rescue equipment
rescue.value: AIS life jackets, life raft, EPIRB emergency beacon

medical.label: Medical
medical.value: Comprehensive medical kit (skipper military medically trained)

suggestions.title: Route suggestions
routes: Fuerteventura or, on longer cruises, to La Palma
"Easy Going" from bay to bay or sporty mileage cruise – you decide (beginners welcome and actively involved if desired)

planning.title: Travel planning
options: Direct flight Zurich → Gran Canaria with Edelweiss (approx. 4 h, CHF 300–550)
Direct flight Basel → Gran Canaria with EasyJet (from approx. CHF 300)
Many other cities in Europe from ~ EUR 100
We are happy to organize the transfer from the airport to the TOAD
